Palmar surface.gif) ![Dorsal interossei (left) @grayAnatomyHumanBody1918](/The Archive/Images/Gray anatomy 1918 images/Myology/image428 The Interossei dorsales of left hand.gif) ::: ::: {.callout title="Reading list"} - Interosseous, Lumbrical, and Abductor Digiti Minimi Muscles @donnellyTravellSimonsSimons2019 - @neumannKinesiologyMusculoskeletalSystem2017 ::: ::: {#tbl-oian .cell message='false' execution_count=1} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ```{=html}
Muscle Origin Insertion Innervation Action
1st Dorsal interossei (hand) 1-2nd MCP adjacent sides 2nd dorsal digital expansion
2nd Proximal Phalanx (radial border)		 Ulnar n.
C8 - T1		 2nd digit: MCP Flexion, PIP & DIP Extension & Abduction
2nd Dorsal interossei (hand) 2-3rd MCP adjacent sides 3rd dorsal digital expansion
3rd Proximal Phalanx (radial border)		 Ulnar n.
C8 - T1		 3rd digit: MCP Flexion, PIP & DIP Extension & Abduction
3rd Dorsal interossei (hand) 3-4th MCP adjacent sides 4th dorsal digital expansion
4th Proximal Phalanx (radial border)		 Ulnar n.
C8 - T1		 4th digit: MCP Flexion, PIP & DIP Extension & Abduction
4th Dorsal interossei (hand) 4-5th MCP adjacent sides 5th dorsal digital expansion
5th Proximal Phalanx (radial border)		 Ulnar n.
C8 - T1		 5th digit: MCP Flexion, PIP & DIP Extension & Abduction
``` ::: ::: # Origin {#origin} - **1st**: 1-2nd metacarpals @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **2nd**: 2-3rd metacarpals @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **3rd**: 3-4th metacarpals @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **4th**: 4-5th metacarpals @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 Adjacent side of 2 adjacent metacarpals # Insertion {#insertion} - **1st**: 2nd DDE, 2nd proximal phalanx (radial side) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **2nd**: 3rd DDE, 3rd proximal phalanx (radial side) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **3rd**: 3rd DDE, 3rd proximal phalanx (ulnar side) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **4th**: 4th DDE, 4th proximal phalanx (ulnar side) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 Base of prox phalanges and ext expansions of digits 2-4 # Innervation {#innervation} [Deep Br. of Ulnar N.]({{< var ref-deep-branch-of-ulnar-nerve.path >}}) ([C8]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c8 >}}), [T1]({{< var ref-nerve-root.t1 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Action {#action} - **2-4th MCP**: Flexion @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **2-4th PIP, DIP**: Extension, Abduction @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Notes
